results.overview: A burger-loving hit man, his philosophical partner, a drug-addled gangster's moll and a washed-up boxer converge in this sprawling, comedic crime caper. Their adventures unfurl in three stories that ingeniously trip back and forth in time.
results.title: Pulp Fiction

results.original_title: Pulp Fiction: The Golden Age of Storytelling
results.overview: This program profiles writers of the 20s, 30s, and 40s--known as the Pulp Fiction era. These writers created the iconic movies and characters who live on today in our collective hearts and imaginations. It has even been estimated that 90-95% of the top blockbusters in Hollywood movies were based on stories from the Pulp Fiction era.
results.title: Pulp Fiction: The Golden Age of Storytelling

results.overview: Behind the scenes of the legendary classic film by Quentin Tarantino.
results.title: Pulp Fiction: The Facts
